Ad Blocker is not just another ad-blocking extension in the store. It stands out from the crowd because of its stringent no-acceptable-ads policy. While other ad blockers might let a few ads slip through the cracks, Ad Blocker ensures that your browsing experience remains completely ad-free.

Ad Blocker is committed to delivering an ad-free internet experience. It blocks ads, but more importantly, it blocks interruptions, distractions, and annoyances. Ad Blocker is your trusted partner in creating a more productive and enjoyable online environment. 

Ad Blocker is incredibly easy to use. With its auto-setup feature, it automatically configures the best ad-blocking rules based on your location. And if you come across a website that doesn't work with the ad blocker, simply add it to your whitelist. 

Ad Blocker's global on/off feature allows you to control your ad-blocking experience. Turn it on when you want an ad-free browsing session, and turn it off when you don't. With Ad Blocker, you are in control.

Say goodbye to intrusive and annoying ads that disrupt your online activities. Ublock Origin Adblocker is the game-changing tool you need to ensure a smooth and enjoyable internet journey.

Unlike many adblockers in the market, Ublock Origin Adblocker stands out for its uncompromising stance against ads. There's no 'acceptable ads policy' here. Ublock Origin Adblocker promises an ad-free environment, making sure that your browsing experience remains uninterrupted and hassle-free.

One of the key features that make Ublock Origin Adblocker a must-have tool is its Auto-setup feature. Depending on your geographic location, Ublock Origin Adblocker enables the best set of filtering rules, ensuring that you only see what matters most to you. No more time wasted on irrelevant content.

Furthermore, Ublock Origin Adblocker recognizes that not all websites are created equal. Some sites may not function optimally with an adblocker. That's why Ublock Origin Adblocker comes with a Whitelist feature. With this, you can add any website to the whitelist and enjoy your browsing without any hiccups.

Ublock Origin Adblocker also offers a global on/off feature. With just a click, you can enable or disable the adblocker across all websites. This gives you full control over your browsing experience. 

Here are some of the exciting features of Ublock Origin Adblocker:

✪ Auto-setup: Ublock Origin Adblocker configures the best filtering rules based on your country.
✪ Whitelist: Add any website to Ublock Origin Adblocker's whitelist if it doesn't work with the adblocker.

✪ การตั้งค่าอัตโนมัติ: ขึ้นอยู่กับประเทศของคุณ เราจะเปิดใช้งานกฎการกรองที่ดีที่สุด
✪ รายการขาว: ถ้าเว็บไซต์บางเว็บไม่ทำงานกับตัวบล็อกโฆษณา คุณสามารถเพิ่มมันเข้าไปในรายการขาว
✪ เปิด / ปิดทั่วโลก
long.tr:
Adkrig is an adblocker. It prevents ads from showing on web pages. 

Unlike many adblockers in the store, Adkrig doesn’t have any acceptable ads policy. 

Features:
✪ Auto-setup: based on your country we will enable the best set of filtering rules.
✪ Whitelists: if some website doesn’t work with adblocker, you can add it to whitelist.
✪ Global on/off

Adkrig bir reklam engelleyicidir. Web sayfalarında reklamların gösterilmesini engeller.

Mağazadaki birçok reklam engelleyiciye kıyasla, Adkrig'in kabul edilebilir reklamlar politikası yoktur.

Özellikler:
✪ Otomatik kurulum: Ülkenize göre en iyi filtreleme kurallarını etkinleştiririz.
✪ Beyaz listeler: Eğer bir web sitesi reklam engelleyiciyle çalışmıyorsa, onu beyaz listeye ekleyebilirsiniz.
✪ Küresel açık/kapalı

Adkrig là một trình chặn quảng cáo. Nó ngăn quảng cáo hiển thị trên các trang web.

Khác với nhiều trình chặn quảng cáo trong cửa hàng, Adkrig không có bất kỳ chính sách quảng cáo chấp nhận được nào.

Tính năng:
✪ Tự động thiết lập: dựa trên quốc gia của bạn, chúng tôi sẽ kích hoạt bộ quy tắc lọc tốt nhất.
✪ Danh sách trắng: nếu một số trang web không hoạt động với trình chặn quảng cáo, bạn có thể thêm nó vào danh sách trắng.
✪ Bật/tắt toàn cầu

Adkrig 是一个广告拦截器。它可以阻止网页上的广告显示。

与商店里的许多广告拦截器不同，Adkrig 没有任何可接受的广告政策。

特点：
✪ 自动设置：根据您的国家，我们将启用最佳的过滤规则集。
✪ 白名单：如果有些网站的广告拦截器无法使用，您可以将其添加到白名单。
✪ 全局开/关

Adkrig 是一款廣告阻擋器。它阻止廣告在網頁上顯示。

與商店中的許多廣告阻擋器不同，Adkrig 沒有任何可接受的廣告政策。

功能：
✪ 自動設定：根據您的國家，我們將啟用最佳的過濾規則集。
✪ 白名單：如果有些網站不能與廣告阻擋器一起工作，您可以將其添加到白名單。
✪ 全局開/關
